title: Mint Apple Crisp
directions: Muddle the apple slices and simple syrup in a mixing glass. Add the mint leaves and press lightly with the muddler. Add the vodka, saké, and ice, and stir until chilled. Double strain into a chilled coupe and garnish with the fanned apple slices.
ingredients: 2 ounces Heart of the Hudson apple vodka
muddler, mixing glass, barspoon, fine-mesh strainer
